channel.title: Drop error
channel.description: Ok i edited a drop. I am pretty sure there are no loose spacings that i tabbed correctly but i got this error. Any help? [code] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 45 at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandler.java:2037) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:547) at server.main(server.java:111) [/code]
